author: Robert Rios

review: I have the Fire TV and you can notice a bit stronger hardware on the Fire TV as opposed to the Fire  TV Stick, but it is not the biggest deal. The Fire Stick might have a weak wifi receiver, or it could just be my repeater. Sometimes when we are watching a movie the connection will be lost and then I have to reset the repeater. When I use the HBO and Showtime apps, it constantly makes me have to register the device every week. It is such a hassle.  It might not be the Fire TV Stick's fault but it does not happen with my Apple TV.  I would like a way to hardwire it to the internet, but other than that it is a great product for the price.
author: Agent Orange Peel

review: Easiest install ever!  My only problem was getting the back off the remote the first time to put in the batteries.  Guess it was stiff from being new.  Neighbor finally got it open...but from there on it's been smooth sailing.  Prime and other services work fast and no "buffering" or loss of network speed through the Fire Stick.
